mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_POST(ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES(SEQ_POST.NEXTVAL, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_READ_COUNT, TBM.ID AS MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBP.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID ORDER BY TBP.ID DESC

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.POST_TITLE, TBP.POST_CONTENT, TBP.POST_READ_COUNT, TBM.ID AS MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_EMAIL FROM TBL_POST TBP JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBP.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID WHERE TBP.ID = #{id}
